description:
Watch full length movies, TV shows and clips on your HP Touchpad free of charge!  
Download the free VIEWSTER app and turn your HP Touchpad into a premium entertainment device.  Choose from a wide range of Hollywood Movies, Classic movies, award-winning independent films, international TV series and funny video clips.

Features:
•	Free Movies App for HP Touchpad 
•	Easy-to-use interface for fast and smart browsing
•	New releases are added continuously
•	Genres: action, comedy, horror, thriller, romance, drama, classics, western
•	Categories: Hollywood movies, Bollywood movies, independent movies,  Oscar award winning movies, Golden Globe award winning movies, German movies
•	Top quality minority content: Turkish Movies, Russian  Movies and Arabic movies and drama shows
•	Watch high quality movies, TV shows and clips via 3G or WiFi

Availability:
•	Languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian
•	App works in all countries including:  USA, UK, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Turkey, Russia, India,  Austria, Switzerland,  Scandinavia, Belgium, Netherlands, Luxemburg
 If you come across any issues while running our app in your device, please report to info@viewster.com along with your device name.

Please rate VIEWSTER’s free video-on-demand app if you like it. If you have any questions, comments or suggestions, feel free to contact us via:

E-Mail:  info@viewster.com
Website: www.viewster.com
Twitter: www.twitter.com/viewster
Facebook: www.facebook.com/viewster
